deleteTip.message: Are you sure to delete this configuration?

auto_wakeup_desc.message: Automatically open and download when downloader is not running

domain_filter_desc.message: Set domains that do not need to be captured

domain_filter_placeholder.message: Enter one domain per line, e.g.: example.com

file_type_filter_desc.message: Set file types that do not need to be captured

file_type_filter_placeholder.message: Enter one file extension per line, e.g.: .jpg

min_file_size_filter_desc.message: Files smaller than the set size will not be captured

enable_remote_download_desc.message: Send download tasks directly to remote server

no_server_error.message: Please add a remote server first

server_url_invalid.message: Please enter a valid server URL

download_notification_desc.message: Show browser notification when sending download tasks

test_token_error.message: Api token error or server not configured correctly

notification_create_success_message.message: Task has been successfully added to download server

notification_create_error_message.message: Task add failed, please check if download server is working properly
